title: Implement Helm Integration
description: Implement Helm integration: List Charts from repositories, List Releases, Install/Upgrade/Uninstall charts.

title: Implement Config Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Config resources: ConfigMaps, Secrets, Resource Quotas, Limit Ranges, HPA, PDBs, Priority Classes, Runtime Classes, Leases. Ensure secret values are masked by default.

title: Implement Network Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Network resources: Services, Endpoints, Ingresses, Network Policies, Port Forwarding. Include visual status for services and endpoints.

title: Implement App Branding and Logo
description: Create application logo (SVG) and generate app icons for all platforms using `tauri icon`. Update Sidebar to use the new logo.
close_reason: Completed logo creation and icon generation.

title: Implement Access Control Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Access Control: Service Accounts, Roles, Cluster Roles, Role Bindings. visualize permissions if possible.

title: Implement Custom Resources Section
description: Implement Custom Resource Definitions (CRD) browser. List CRDs and allow viewing/editing instances of custom resources.

title: Implement Nodes & Cluster Overview
description: Implement Nodes list view with metrics (CPU/Memory usage) if available. Show detailed node status and conditions.

title: Implement Storage Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Storage resources: PVCs, PVs, Storage Classes. Show capacity and usage where possible.

title: Implement Initial MVP: Pods, Theming, and Multi-Cluster
description: Implement the core application shell, including semantic theming (Rusty, Dracula, etc.), multi-cluster management (backend config & sidebar), and the Pods view with real-time updates and batch actions.

title: Implement Events and Namespaces Pages
description: Implement cluster-wide Events viewer and Namespaces management (Create/Delete namespaces).

title: Implement Workloads Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Workload resources: Deployments, DaemonSets, StatefulSets, ReplicaSets, Jobs, CronJobs. Ensure they support filtering by namespace and context.
